```{r}
# Chunk to get data from GEO server. 

# Script from: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/geo2r/?acc=GSE49800


################################################################
#   Boxplot for selected GEO samples
library(Biobase)
library(GEOquery)
# load series and platform data from GEO

gset <- getGEO("GSE49800", GSEMatrix =TRUE, getGPL=FALSE)
if (length(gset) > 1) idx <- grep("GPL6244", attr(gset, "names")) else idx <- 1
gset <- gset[[idx]]

# set parameters and draw the plot

dev.new(width=4+dim(gset)[[2]]/5, height=6)
par(mar=c(2+round(max(nchar(sampleNames(gset)))/2),4,2,1))
title <- paste ("GSE49800", '/', annotation(gset), " selected samples", sep ='')
boxplot(exprs(gset), boxwex=0.7, notch=T, main=title, outline=FALSE, las=2)

```
